divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking on Del Monte Beach, when I noticed what I thought was a tent, or some other canvas object that was lit from inside with a bright red light. The light ascended rapidly, to a high altitude, then hovered for several minutes, at times it would zig-zap in sharp angles from point to point. It was witnessed by five of us. Then, the object moved rapidly high and out of sight. The light was gone.
Summary: A bright red light was low, and acted as if it was launched. Then rocketed upward, and hovered, occasionally zig-zagging. It was very bright red. There were multiple witnesses.
